title: Community emergency preparedness includes family needs
description: Community emergency preparedness includes family needs
content:
Scenario: Community emergency preparedness includes family needs
    Given emergencies affect families with unique challenges
    And children have specific needs during crisis
    When the community_elohim coordinates emergency preparedness
    Then it should ensure family needs are centered in planning
    And Sarah's knowledge of family needs should inform planning
    And emergency care resources should include childcare and family support
    And parent expertise should shape community resilience
    And the system should recognize that community safety includes child safety
    And family preparedness should be community priority
